original_title: Goosebumps: The Werewolf of Fever Swamp
overview: The story follows Grady Tucker, who moves into a new house next to the Fever Swamp with his family. After a swamp deer is killed, his father believes Grady's dog is responsible, but Grady is convinced a werewolf is the culprit.
tagline: Who's afraid of the big bad wolf?
title: Goosebumps: The Werewolf of Fever Swamp
